author: senh
title: Today in Pictures: August 9
text: Loading... BING NEWS: 'I thought it would be fun to try!' Today show host Savannah Guthrie, 43, gets Botox live on air Today show host Savannah Guthrie underwent Botox live on air on Friday morning during a segment about plastic surgery secrets. The 43-year-old mother-of-one admitted to Dr. Amy Wechsler, a New York-based dermatologist and psychiatrist, that she previously ... 08/8/2015 - 7:38 pm | View Link Happy 50th Birthday, Singapore Through pictures and videos, TODAY's photographers and reporters showcase how Singaporeans across the island are celebrating National Day this year, starting from 12am till 11.59pm. Click here for more. 08/8/2015 - 7:17 pm | View Link Subhash Ghai comes out in support of Radhe Maa, calls her ‘childish’! Radhe Maa has literally become the ‘hot’ topic of discussion today courtesy her objectionable pictures circulating on the Internet. Devotees are shocked to find their so called ‘Godwoman’ dancing on the streets sporting a skimpy outfit. A Mumbai ... 08/8/2015 - 5:20 pm | View Link In Pictures: ‘Welcome Back’ title track launch The title song of the forthcoming Anees Bazmee directorial ‘Welcome Back’ happened earlier today. Producer Firoz A Nadiadwallah & Eros International promise double the laughter and extravagance with the family comedy entertainer, Welcome Back. 08/8/2015 - 8:11 am | View Link Swim at your own risk in Today in Pictures Lightning strikes south of Aptos, Calif., on Thursday. According to the National Weather Service the storm system was predicted to bring the chance of thunderstorms to the waters Thursday, with light to moderate winds across the coastal waters through Friday.
